title: Repco Bank Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 06 Assistant Manager, Officer on Special Duty Posts
description: The Repco Bank has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06Â Assistant Managers, a Translator, and an Officer on Special Duty Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed Any Degree, LLB, and B.E./B. Tech can apply for the Repco Bank Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit...
